topic: How to describe a diffuse illuminating pane?
body:
Dear group,


A quick question. 
Which material can be used to describe a diffuse illuminating pane, cf. http://www.optilite.dk/ovenlyskupler/pc-ovenlys.html (hvælvet opal polycarbonat)?




Best regards


Per Haugaard
